sub_title: (Sworn) translator Dutch-English vv / homework mediator / teacher of English
summary:
I love working with languages and with people! Always with a clear view to the well-being of the world and my fellow human beings. I have clear ideals in life and a social line of approach, which can both be worked out perfectly in a professional setting.
Translation: both translating and editing are among my favourite duties. I have many years of experience in environmental technology, mechanical engineering, social, environmental and world developement issues.
Teaching: I enjoy teaching Dutch and English to secondary school pupils in grades 1 u/i 6 and to adults. Furthermore, home work mediation in almost any secondary school subject. Either in a class or a 1-1 setting.
